name: Ablaze
desc: 150% attack damage

name: Stamina
desc: Increase life gauge and regeneration.

name: Might
desc: Becomes one with your sword.

name: Rage
desc: Agitates as HP falls down and also increases your defense rate. Your normal attack will be a percentage higher depending on the percentage of life you have lost.\n\nThe rage effect depends on the skill level. Having a 25% life, which is 75% lost life, and you have the max skill level, you get 50% effectiveness which causes 35% normal attack damage increase.

name: Kenzaragi
desc: Originates from an ancient swordsmen tribe that heats up the sword and deals great damage. Also increases normal attack damage for 8 seconds.

name: Centrifugal Force
desc: An outward force emitted from spinning sword. Splash damage to 1 cell away surrounding enemies

name: Way of the Sword
desc: A skill pioneered by Marucs, a legendary swordsman. Target's your enemy's joints and inflicts two slashes. On successful hit, the enemy will suffer defense down for 8 seconds.

name: Soul blade
desc: Increase weapon damage for 60 seconds.

name: Helios' Guard
desc: Skill power of Helios. Increases player protection for 60 seconds

name: Battle Aura
desc: Enchant party with strength. Raises maximum attack damage of all visible party members, including you, for 15 seconds

name: Berserk
desc: Increase normal attack speed by 25% but lowers your defense for 60 seconds. There is also an increase to the effect of normal attack damage of the rage effect.

name: Retaliate
desc: Counter-back to an attack, observe movements to counter attack physical damage received from nearby enemies for 60 seconds. 25% critical damage of your normal attack damage retaliated

name: Empire Shock
desc: Shocks the area and damage all enemies within range. A powerful no-miss splash damage to 3.5 cells away surrounding enemies giving them dodge penalty for 15 seconds. However, you also receive same damage as you did.\n\nYou can not use this skill after 10 seconds because of sudden fatigue.

name: Dark Blade
desc: Swordsman technique that damage an enemy using HP. HP deduction will be half the damage you inflicted.

name: Terror of the Empire
desc: Strikes a powerfull combo. 2 strikes when used alone. 3 strikes when used right after Level 10 Way of the sword. 25% chance to prevent enemy from moving for 2 seconds.\n\nWhen you mastered this and Berserk skill, you will have 10% chance to land two slashes this skill on enemy for 100% damage per slash while you are in Berserk mode but have no mana cost, 2-sec walk penalty and considered as normal attack damage so rage effect is still applied.

name: Battle Roar
desc: +30 maximum attack damage to all visible party members for 20 seconds

name: True Berserker
desc: Special skill that can only be invoked when Berserk is used right after Battle Roar. Same effect as Berserk but have no defense penalty.

name: Earth Breaker
desc: Special skill that can only be invoked when Empire Shock is used right after Empire Breaker or Battle Roar. When used right after Empire Breaker's complete combo chain of Way of the Sword and Terror of the Empire, damage will be doubled but not the damage you will receive.\n\nWhen chained from Battle Cry, +50% damage but not the damage you will receive. The splash range also extends to 4 cells. The dodge and defense penalty extends to 20 seconds.

name: Empire Breaker
desc:
Targets enemy's weakest point. When used alone, inflicts 100% damage and enemy will be 12.5% vulnerable to critical damage (if attack didn't miss) for 10 seconds.

When used right after Level 10 Way of the Sword, will inflict 200% damage and critical penalty of 16.8% for 12 seconds, also extends Way of the Sword defense down penalty for 12 seconds.

There is a special combo chain if Level 10 Way of the Sword is followed by Level 10 Terror of the Empire then followed by this skill wherein inflicts 400% damage and extends Way of the Sword defense penalty and 16.8% critical penalty to 15 seconds but you will undergo sudden fatigue that prevents you from using any skill for 3 seconds.

name: Impulse
desc: 150% attack damage

name: Alert
desc: Alert nerve points for better evasion.

name: Double Edge
desc: Adds chance to damage an enemy using both edge of the dagger inflicting double damage. Also increases your attack damage.

name: Eccentric
desc: Decrease attack speed delays, improve critical hits and enhance Double Edge chance.

name: Stab
desc: Two sharp and powerful strikes

name: Steal
desc: Steals an item from enemy. There is 50% chance that the stolen item will be dropped again by the monster. A monster can only be stolen once.

name: Enshroud
desc: A skill that can only be used if you're standing right beside any wall. Monsters will stop attacking you and agressive monsters won't be able to see you.\n\nYou can not use any item if this skill is activated, however, you can still regenerate life and mana. Walking or attacking anything will deactivate this skill.

name: Dual Dagger Art
desc:
Improve ambidexterity when using dual dagger.

Being able to handle dual dagger is one of unique capabilities of Bandits. The double edge chance percentage will turn into attack damage percentage increase instead as you become a Bandit.

While using dual dagger, your right-hand attack will do 100% of your damage while the other hand do 50% damage, a total of 150% damage on each normal attack if you have maxed out Eccentric and Double Edge skill.

name: Time Compression
desc: Increase normal attack speed by 25% but lowers your dodge for 60 seconds

name: Fatal Aura
desc: Enhances critical rate and boosts your luck attribute. Your luck to be boosted comes from your attribute excluding luck effect from items.\n\nYour base luck will serve as an additional critical rate. Having 50 luck and max level of this skill boosts critical rate by +7.8% and 22% of luck which is +11%.

name: Mana Steal
desc: Drains mana of the enemy on each attack for 60 seconds. Chance is 50% of your critical rate from luck, excluding critical effect from buffs. Chance can also be increased by upgrading this skill.

name: Anu yon!?
desc: Uses your money to distract enemy. The enemy will end up facing backwards and get stunned but gets normal after receiving any damage. You can only fool enemy once every 30 seconds.

name: Evading Backstab
desc: Fully avoid next physical damage you will receive. Doesn't work on critical and magical attacks. The chance will be 1/4 if the next damage done by a skill.

name: Lock
desc: Holds-up an enemy. A skill that can only be used to enemies that was successfully Evading Backstabbed. You and the enemy will not be able to move for 30 seconds.\n\nThis skill will be cancelled once you have received a damage or you walked. If you are buffed by Vitality Barrier, it is not counted as a hit so you continue to hold up the enemy. Doesn't work on boss monsters.

name: Hey Looser
desc:
Piss-off enemy and make him do nothing but to attack you for 5 seconds, the enemy will be unable to control himself. The first damage you will receive from the enemy will be critical and +25% damage because the enemy is really pissed-off. The enemy will be calm and be back to normal when he receive any healing skill.

You can only be successfull pissing-off Deacons/Clerics if they don't have any ally 2-cells near from them.

You can only piss-off enemy once every 60 seconds.

name: Mist
desc: Disperse smoke around to enhance dodge for 60 seconds.

name: Sonic
desc: Speeds up running for 8 seconds.

name: Backstab
desc: Inflicts critical damage. This skill can only be used if you're standing right behind the enemy

name: Chaos Overdrive
desc: A skill that only belongs to most trained and dangerous Bandits in Pacifica who have mastered the art of dual dagger. Multiplies yourself in to three to strike up multiple damage to enemy. You can't use any skill for 2 seconds because of sudden vertigo.

name: Time Master
desc: Special skill that can only be invoked when Level 10 Time Compression is used right after Level 10 Mist. Same effect as Time Compression but have no dodge penalty.

name: Fury
desc: 150% damage

name: Expand Territory
desc: Familiarizes the area of combat to shoot arrows much farther than usual.

name: Enforce Bow
desc: Passively acquires the prime foundation of the bow.

name: Mental Adroitness
desc: Targets enemies' vital points easier and shoot arrows more accurately.

name: Rejuvinating Clash
desc: Uses area energy collision to create an open root of energy causing a much better mana rejuvination.

name: Double Projectile
desc: Learns dual arrow handling in a bow to release two arrows in a row.

name: Arrow Stun
desc: A 3 cell-ranged attack that stuns enemies and make them immobilized for 2.5 seconds. Inflicts 50% damage to each affected enemies.

name: Sharpshoot
desc: Most likely a raven for hunting its prey. The raven's eye.

name: Deathly Edge
desc: Enchant with the power of Apollo for 60 seconds

name: Speed Ballista
desc: Turns into a burst firing machine. 25% faster normal attack speed but decreases your defense for 60 seconds.

name: Riot Arrow
desc: Enhances critical rate and boosts your luck attribute. Your luck to be boosted comes from your attribute excluding luck effect from items.\n\nYour base luck will serve as an additional critical rate. Having 50 luck and max level of this skill boosts critical rate by +7.8% and 22% of luck which is +11%.

name: Set Explosives
desc: Requires Mine item. Deals splash (2 cells) damage that doesn't miss. Increasing level of this skill enhances your mine planting ability and techniques to optimize the mine explosion damage. Up to 3 mines can be planted.

name: Detonate Explosives
desc: Detonation skill for explosives.

name: Drop Sticker
desc: Requires sticker item. Up to 3 stickers can be planted.

name: Activate Stickers
desc: Activation skill for stikers.

name: Gatling Fury
desc: Deals 100% damage to target plus 2 nearby enemies.

name: Turbulence
desc: Strikes a long lasting linear damage that damages all enemies along the direction of the target.\n\nThe initial damage will be received by the nearest enemy, the following enemy will receive a damage decreased by 12.5% and so on. It keeps hitting enemies along the direction until the damage goes zero.

name: Summon Materia
desc: Build an orb that is made up of soul using your mana. An orb will have have lives depending on skill level. Up to 3 orbs can be built but destroys orbs that are farther than 8 cells from the current orb to build.

name: Defuse Materia
desc: Reverts all orbs back to mana.\n\nIf you used this inside the triangle you have formed, you recall all materia instead. After the recall process, upon using this skill again you instead summon all materia back to it's original position.

name: Ricochet
desc: Enables attack to bounce back and deal double damage. Can only be used if the target enemy have soul orb behind him/her (within 6 cells) along the direction of attack. Consumes 1 life of the soul orb that rebounded your arrow.

name: Split Shot
desc: Enables single attack to became two. Can only be used if the target enemy have soul orb in front of him/her (within 6 cells) along the direction of attack. Consumes 1 life of the soul orb that splitted your arrow.

name: Power Thrust
desc: Uses your great dexterity, hidden strength and soul orbs to push back enemy for a very long distance upon his/her next move. Can only be used if you are surrounded by 3 soul orbs.\n\nConsumes 1 lives of each orbs to succesfully push back enemy upon doing an attack. You will receive the damage as full and no-miss but the enemy will receive a massive strike no-miss damage that pushes him/her back too far away. Damage depends on your Strength attribute.

name: Hedron Stunner
desc: Orders your soul orbs to strike magical damage to all enemies inside the triangle it has formed. Requires you to have at least 2 lives on each orbs. Consumes 2 lives of each orbs. The enemies will be immobilized.\n\nMateria will recharge after 8 seconds before you can use it again.

name: Hedron Break
desc: Strikes magical damage to enemy with the help of your soul orbs and your mana. Can only be used if the target enemy is surrounded by 3 soul orbs you have built and have at least 2 lives on each orbs. Consumes 2 lives of each orbs to succeed on the attack. You can't use any skill for 2 seconds because of sudden soul fatigue.

name: Spirit Break
desc: Most basic skill that inflicts damage to enemies soul.

name: Open Chakra
desc:
Increase your wisdom attribute, mana gauge and regeneration.

You regenerate more mana depending on how many non-deacon partymates around you within 4 cells.

Regeneration also increases depending on how many endangered (50% life) non-deacon partymates. The effect of mana regeneration of this skill is constant regardless if you're sitting or not.

name: Heal
desc: Simple prayer that restores small HP of the target yet damage undead enemies. The healing effect depends on your Wisdom attribute.

name: Angel's Touch
desc: Restores a smaller amount of target's HP yet damage an undead.

name: Teleport
desc: Warps to other map. When you're not moving, it will randomly warps you to any part of the map you're currently at. If you used this skill while moving, it will warp you to the nearest neighbor map along the direction of walking path.\n\nCannot be used in some restricted maps.

name: Compel Strength
desc: Increases the attack damage of the target for 2 minutes

name: Invoke Endurance
desc: Increases the defense of the target for 2 minutes

name: Intensify Focus
desc: Increases the accuracy and minimum attack damage of the target for 2 minutes

name: Awaken Haste
desc: Increases the attack speed of the target for 2 minutes

name: Enliven Knowledge
desc: Increases the magical power of the target for 2 minutes. Heal skill is also affected by this skill.

name: Solidify Courage
desc: Increases the magic defense of the target for 2 minutes

name: Retract Evasion
desc: Increases the dodge of the target for 2 minutes

name: Indulge Fatality
desc: Increases the critical rate of the target for 2 minutes

name: Soul Heal
desc: Powerful heal that restores great amount of HP. 200% Heal effect.\n\nAlso improves wisdom, mana gauge and mana regeneration passively.

name: Heal Spirits
desc: Heals every target within 3 cells yet damages undeads. Healing power is the similar to Heal skill.

name: Vitality Barrier
desc:
Creates a temporary barrier and endure on the target.

Barrier's life depends on your wisdom attribute and is similar to the formula of Healing power of Heal skill. Barrier expires after 2 minutes or until it's life goes beyond zero.

The barrier's life would not exceed to 50% of the target's max life and also doesn't stack up.

name: Chakra Prayer
desc: Prayer that allows all visible party members to regenerate mana faster than usual.\n\nDoubles up natural and foritude-based mana regeneration points but not the effect of Open Chakra of Deacons and Rejuvinating Clash of Archers.

name: Gift of Life
desc:
Revive a fallen playing character.

Restores target's EXP penalty upon death (to party mates only).

Cannot be used during Guild War.

name: Chakra Barrier
desc: Uses your mana as your life for 60 secs or until mana is less than 12.5%

name: Chain Punishment
desc: Next damage inflicted to the target will be much painful after using this technic. Consecutive damages are doubled until the life punishment runs out. Does not work with magic attacks, but works when healing the undeads. Each damage decreases life punishment by equal to the damage dealt.\n\nIf life punishment is 500 and the next damage is 200, the next damage will be 400 instead but the life punishment decreases to 300.

name: Circle of Fate
desc:
Summons the cicle of fate that heats up damage within the circle range.

Gives accuracy, defense and critical penalty to affected enemies for 10 seconds by striking a very bright circle. Inflicts damage depending on your current mana.

The Circle of Fate lasts for fixed 3 seconds. During the circle's life, your spirit is submitted to the God of Fortitude which renders you temporarily unusable.

Damage will be half against non-undead enemies.
